name: Galeb Duhr
resistances: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

traits.name: False Appearance
traits.description: If the galeb duhr is motionless at the start of combat, it has Advantage on its Initiative roll. Moreover, if a creature hasn't observed the galeb duhr move or act, that creature must succeed on a DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) check to discern that the galeb duhr is animate.

traits.name: Rolling Charge
traits.description: If the galeb duhr moves at least 15 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a Slam attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or have the Prone condition.

multiattack.description: The galeb duhr makes two Slam attacks.

actions.name: Slam
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Animate Boulders
actions.description: The galeb duhr magically animates up to two boulders it can see within 60 feet of itself. Each animated boulder uses the Galeb Duhr stat block, except it has Intelligence 1 (-5) and Charisma 1 (-5), it can't use Animate Boulders, and it reverts to an inanimate boulder if reduced to 0 Hit Points or after 1 minute.

summon.notes: Each animated boulder uses the Galeb Duhr stat block with Intelligence 1 (-5) and Charisma 1 (-5), can't use Animate Boulders, and reverts to an inanimate boulder if reduced to 0 Hit Points or after 1 minute.
